name: Lessons in Love
storyline:
Take over as the teacher of ten high school students as they attempt to find their way through life. Manage and develop relationships with each of them in the fictional city of Kumon-mi. Choose how to spend your time after school and on weekends to best suit the path you want to take. Whether it be visiting the girls at their part time jobs, trying to convince them to let you into their dorm rooms, or just hanging out at the local bar, there is always something to do in Lessons of Love.

Please note, some things in this game may be meant to confuse or disturb you. But don't worry! Everything will be okay~
summary:
Welcome to Lessons in Love, an ongoing adult dating sim about a class of 20 students trying to make their way through life. Take over as their teacher and build relationships with each of them as you attempt to find your own place in their world.

Please note, some things in this game may be meant to confuse or disturb you. Please don't worry, though. Everything will be okay ~
